original_text: So Shishak king of Egypt came up against Jerusalem. He took away the treasures of the house of the Lord and the treasures of the king's house. He took away everything. He also took away the shields of gold that Solomon had made,
korean_text: 애굽 왕 시삭이 올라와서 예루살렘을 치고 여호와의 전 보물과 왕궁의 보물을 모두 빼앗고 솔로몬이 만든 금 방패도 빼앗은지라

sentences.original_text: So Shishak king of Egypt came up against Jerusalem.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 이집트 왕 시삭이 예루살렘을 치러 올라왔습니다.

sentences.original_text: He took away the treasures of the house of the Lord
and the treasures of the king's house.
He also took away the shields of gold
